title: The library of choice literature :
snippet: [Thomas Aird, born at Bowden, l.o..l.urghshir, 28th August, 1802 ; died at Castlebank, Dumfries.

title: A selection from the correspondence of the late Thomas Chalmers /
author: Chalmers, Thomas
snippet: We heard, while at Castlebank, that Catharine and Annehad been in London.

title: A selection from the correspondence of the late Thomas Chalmers /
author: Chalmers, Thomas
snippet: Mrs. Chalraers and I went this day week toCastlebank in quest of sleep for rae, and we returned yesterday.

title: A selection from the correspondence of the late Thomas Chalmers /
author: Chalmers, Thomas
snippet: We were out at Castlebank the other day at a great New-year's festival ; and I, as being now the patriarch of our immediate rdationship, give the New-year's day dinner to-morrow.

title: A selection from the correspondence of the late Thomas Chalmers /
author: Chalmers, Thomas
snippet: She is now at Castlebank, and proposes to go to Wishaw and Skirling.
